extendedInfo.description: Make cheap or FREE VoIP calls or send low-cost SMS from your Android with MO-Call! With MO-Call Mobile VoIP application for Android you can call your friends and family or send cheap SMS whenever you want and save money when calling abroad.  VOIP calls and instant messages to other MO-Call users on your contact list is completely FREE.Now with version 3.0.0 you can send free instant messages to your MO-Call contacts or share your location , contacts, images, videos, audios, and call them for free through a Wi-Fi connection if they are online.The application features VoIP calling via Wi-Fi and 3G. This means the new app allows the user to dial directly over VoIP using a Wi-Fi access point or use the mobile networks operatorâs 3G data channel. MO-Call is where Skype meets WhatsUp and Viber. It is enough for all your communication needs.Some of new features are: IM (Instant Messaging), location and contact sharing, file sharing (image, video, audio) emoticons, personalized wallpaper (Now you can set application wallpaper to anything you want through general settings),  brand new and intuitive interface, improved usability and low-cost SMS. Now you can make cheap or free VoIP calls directly from the applicationâs integrated dialer or by dialing directly from your phoneâs dialer or your phone book.If you have Internet connection, you can send cheap SMS either from MO-Call application, or directly from your phone book. Fill in destination number in international format, type in message text, and hit Send.You can make cheap international mobile calls and send cheap text messages (SMS) to countries including: Afghanistan, Algeria, Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bangladesh, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, Colombia, Denmark, Egypt, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hongkong, China, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, China, Malaysia, Mexico, Morocco, Mozambique, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nigeria, Norway, Pakistan, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Turkey, UAE (United Arab Emirates), Ukraine, UK (United Kingdom), USA (United States of America).MO-Call Application is free and there's no subscription cost and no hidden charges. With the WiFi connection, you only pay MO-Callâs international calling rates.To find out more about MO-Call, visit: www.mo-call.comFollow us on Twitter twitter.com/#!/MorodoGroup Join us on Facebook www.facebook.com/pages/MO-Call/61938671672If you need any further assistance write us at support@mo-call.comKeywords: instant messenger, cheap international calling, calling app, mvoip, mobile voip, calling credit, free voip deal, voip discount, WIFI, telbo, voipbuster, intelligibility, smart voip, low rate voip, dialnow, internet calls, action voip, voip raider, message, cheap voip, softphone, quality, presence, dtmf, telephony, bandwidth, xmpp, telephone, phonebook, file sharing

reviews.title: Simple and efficient
reviews.comment: I have used Mo-call on different platforms for international calls. It is easy to install, works straight afterwards and is user-friendly. It always reminds you of your balance and tells you how many minutes your new call will last on your balance. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: FADE IBITOYE

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Excellent, how ever the Im status always In offline e \'ve n though the user is online
reviews.author: Ram Kumar

reviews.title: Very good not excellent
reviews.comment: I have used MoCall for many years for making international calls. It worked excellently for a long time then I upgraded my phone to SGS3 and it became unstable. I also feel the call quality has dropped recently. But it\'s functionality of running in the background silently and intercepting international calls to reroute on its own network without much user intervention is fantastic. Overall a very good app but it needs to keep up with new devices coming out more quickly and not let the service levels fall.
reviews.author: Shikoh Khan

reviews.title: MO-Call App
reviews.comment: The app allows for calls from access number in 40 countries and SMS or Internet triggered call back. Most other calling Apps do not offer this. I use it for every day.
reviews.author: Andrew Reid
